1. overflow happens while j=13 i=479001600
2. 1.0/0.0 = inf
3. float overflow while j=35	v=inf	 is_inf=1
7. underflow happens while i=41, sin(1.1234567*f)/f = 1.12325
8. pi=314159265358979323846264338327952884197169399375105820974944592307816406286208998628034825342117067982148086513282366470938446955582231725359408128481117450
